scripts.start: npm run clean && parcel src/pages/*/index.html src/pages/*.html -p 7777
scripts.start:api: npm run clean && parcel src/pages/*/index.html src/pages/*.html -p 7777 --open
scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build src/pages/*.html --public-url ./ --no-source-maps && parcel build src/pages/*/*.html --public-url ../ --no-source-maps
scripts.build:analyze: parcel build src/pages/*.html --public-url ./ --no-source-maps && parcel build src/pages/*/*.html --public-url ../ --no-source-maps --reporter @parcel/reporter-bundle-analyzer
scripts.clean:win32: (rmdir /s /q .parcel-cache || (echo Failed to delete .parcel-cache)) && (rmdir /s /q dist  || (echo Failed to delete dist))
